name: Maze of Gaea（Real Maze VR Simulation）
description: Have you ever been challenged in a real maze? Stand tall and find the path of the maze, and then try to get out of the maze by memory. It's a double test of patience and memory. We have crafted seven labyrinths, each with its own characteristics, come into the maze of virtual reality .
minimum_requirements: OS: windows7,windows10 Processor: i5-6300 Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: gtx-970 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 5000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows7,windows10 Processor: i7-6700 Memory: 6000 MB RAM Graphics: gtx-1070 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 6000 MB available space
